divs: Sighting DetailsDriving home with my husband, it was bright enough (kind of like a firework) that you couldn't miss it, and when it went through the sky it was viewable from our car's windshield, we weren't sure, my husband thought it was a firework or falling star, I wasn't sure I immediately thought of a ufo. The object was round, with a tail that glowed as soon as it started to descend the back part where the tail started from the ball of light looked like it caught on fire. I immediately got nervous and scared and we wanted to go look for it, but didn't have the time. The object vanished after it looked like it caught on fire.
Summary: burst into the sky and then after making the descent dissapeared
trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Portales
There were no other sightings in Portales on or around September 10th 2012
